wikitext.*:
'''A誰lior''' were probably the [[fays]] of lakes and pools, according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] associated with ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref name=Ail>{{PE|14}}, "[[The Creatures of the Earth]]", pp. 7, 10</ref>

== Etymology ==
The name ''A誰lior'' is in [[Qenya]], probably being related to the word ''[[ailin]]'' ("lake").<ref name=Ail/>

In the ''[[Gnomish Lexicon]]'', there also appear the words ''[[ailo]]'' ("a lake, pool") and its [[Gnomish]] cognate ''[[ail]]''.<ref>{{PE|11}}, entry '''ail''', p. 17</ref>
